price: آیا پیش از قرآن كتابى به آنان داده‌ایم كه به آن استدلال كنند؟
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
